Plot: The Buckman family is a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.
Title: Parenthood
Writer: Lowell Ganz (story), Babaloo Mandel (story), Ron Howard (story), Lowell Ganz (screenplay), Babaloo Mandel (screenplay)
Actors: Steve Martin, Mary Steenburgen, Dianne Wiest, Jason Robards
tomatoConsensus: Bolstered by a delightful cast, Parenthood is a funny and thoughtfully crafted look at the best and worst moments of family life that resonates broadly.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 10 nominations.
